thread.title: Ikeja SLG, Dauda Distributes Food Items To Residents | Independent Newspaper Nigeria
thread.title_full: Ikeja SLG, Dauda Distributes Food Items To Residents | Independent Newspaper Nigeria

author: Oluseyi Taiwo-Oguntuase
title: Ikeja SLG, Dauda Distributes Food Items To Residents | Independent Newspaper Nigeria
text: Hon. Akeem Olalekan Dauda, the Secretary to the Ikeja local government has given out food items as support to residents in the six political wards in the local government area. The food items which was distributed through the community leaders which include the traditional rulers, party leaders and also LGA and ward executive was aimed to support leaders and members of the party during the festive season. The leaders who got the food items for distribution include: six community heads, 23 apex leaders of the All Progressive Congress (APC) in the local government area, 24 APC chairpersons across the LGA, six ward executive, former LGA executives, former Councilors, former Ward Chairmen, former council executive among others. Dauda who is also the Secretary of Conference of Secretaries across the 20 local government areas and 37 local council development areas in the State, said that the gesture is aimed at supporting leaders and members of the party during the Christmas and New Year celebration. Dauda who prayed for peace and stability during the festive season enjoined the community leaders and residents of the Local Government to continue to support the administration of Governor Babajide Sanwo-Olu in the bid to spread good governance across the nooks and crannies of Lagos State.
